archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.1: A change management process should be established, which covers all types of change (e.g. upgrades and modifications to applications, hardware and software, modifications to information, emergency fixes, and changes to systems and networks).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
